name: MADHYA PRADESH ASSOCIATION OF WOMEN ENTREPRENEURS
briefDescription: MAWE (Madhya Pradesh Association of Women Entrepreneurs) is a registered NGO based at Jabalpur, (M.P.). The only NGO working extensively in Central India for empowering women through Entrepreneurship & self employment. We encourage entrepreneurship in young girls & women & also provide a hand holding support to existing women entrepreneurs to scale up their enterprise in a sustainable manner. We conduct workshops and seminars to educate and encourage women & youth at large in urban and rural sectors.MAWE is working for WIDOW/ DIVORCE & single women Empowerment, to make them economically independent by various training programmes & workshops.
